Hello and Welcome

UNIT 1

S.O.S. BOX

  • I have (brown) eyes.
  • I have a small/big mouth.
  • I have white teeth.
  • I have short/long hair.
  • I have bushy/thin eyebrows.
  • I have a small/big nose.

Guess the characters...

We have two new classmates in the class. Look at the descriptions we wrote of Caroline and Michael. Draw their faces.
